const API_BASE="https://nimbustodo.azurewebsites.net/api";// Later, update this to your deployed Azure Function URL
export const addTask=async task=>{console.log("üõ∞Ô∏è Sending task to Azure (add):",task);const res=await fetch("https://nimbustodo.azurewebsites.net/api/add_task",{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify(task)});const result=await res.json();console.log("‚úÖ Azure responded to add_task:",result);return result;};export const deleteTask=async taskId=>{console.log("üóëÔ∏è Sending delete request for task:",taskId);const res=await fetch(`https://nimbustodo.azurewebsites.net/api/delete_task/${taskId}`,{method:"DELETE"});const result=await res.text();console.log("‚úÖ Azure responded to delete_task:",result);return result;};export const editTask=async(taskId,updates)=>{console.log("‚úèÔ∏è Sending update for task:",taskId,"with data:",updates);const res=await fetch(`https://nimbustodo.azurewebsites.net/api/edit_task/${taskId}`,{method:"PUT",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify(updates)});const result=await res.json();console.log("‚úÖ Azure responded to edit_task:",result);return result;};
